name: Dumeho
strategy_rules:
select(P, O, S, M):-
    \+ holds(last_move(O, _LMo), S),
    holds(default_move(P, M), S).
select(_P, O, S, Mo):-
    holds(last_move(O, Mo), S).
game_rules:
/* Game specific predicates for Electric Vehicle Game */

:- discontiguous effect/3.
:- discontiguous initially/2.

% Payoff matrix (market share changes in percentage points)
payoff('SEDAN', 'SEDAN', 10, -10).
payoff('SUV', 'SUV', 10, -10).
payoff('SEDAN', 'SUV', -15, 15).
payoff('SUV', 'SEDAN', -15, 15).

% Initial state
initial(s0).

% What holds initially
initially(player(small_company), s0).
initially(player(big_company), s0).
initially(role(small_company, row), s0).
initially(role(big_company, col), s0).
initially(control(small_company), s0).
initially(control(big_company), s0).
initially(default_move(_, 'SEDAN'), s0).

% Final state definition
final(do(move(_P2, _M2), do(move(_P1, _M1), S))):-initial(S).

% Legal moves
legal(move(P, M), S):- possible(move(P, M), S), holds(control(P), S).

% Possible moves
possible(move(P,'SEDAN'), S):- holds(player(P), S).
possible(move(P,'SUV'), S):- holds(player(P), S).

% Opposite moves
opposite_move('SEDAN', 'SUV').
opposite_move('SUV', 'SEDAN').

% Effects of moves
effect(did(P, M), move(P, M), _S).
abnormal(control(P), move(P, _M), _S).

% Final outcome
finally(outcome(P1,M1,U1,P2,M2,U2), S):-
    final(S),
    holds(role(P1, row), S),
    holds(did(P1, M1), S),
    holds(role(P2, col), S),
    holds(did(P2, M2), S),
    payoff(M1, M2, U1, U2).

% Goals
finally(goal(P1, U1), S):-
    finally(outcome(P1,_,U1,_,_,_), S).
finally(goal(P2, U2), S):-
    finally(outcome(_,_,_,P2,_,U2), S).
